# hv_vcpu_get_sme_za_reg(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Returns the value of the vCPU ZA matrix register in streaming Scalable Vector Extension (SVE) mode.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vcpu_get_sme_za_reg(_ vcpu: hv_vcpu_t, _ value: UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>, _ length: Int) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The ID of the vCPU instance.
- **value**: The pointer to the retrieved register value.
- **length**: The length of the provided value storage, in bytes.

## Return Value

`HV_SUCCESS` on success, an error code otherwise

## Discussion



This methods returns an error if `PSTATE.ZA` is `0` (for example, when. [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vcpu_sme_state_t/za_storage_enabled] is `false`), or if the provided value storage isn’t in the range of [maximum SVL bytes x maximum SVL bytes].

This method doesn’t require streaming SVE mode to be in an enabled state.
